'''Utmost Care''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Aaru Mixed Rice]] with [[Candace]]. The recipe for Aaru Mixed Rice is obtainable from [[Azalai]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Utmost Care restores 80 [[Stamina]] with a 300-second cooldown. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
